snippet: Aiming to destroy chemical weapons, the process might open the way to a broader settlement.
abstract: Editorial supports the United States-Russian agreement to dismantle Syria's chemical weapons arsenal, saying it is remarkably ambitious and offers a better chance of deterring the threat than limited military strikes Pres Obama was considering; maintains while task is daunting, now that Russia and the US have reached a deal, there is reason to hope the cooperation will help advance an overall peace settlement for Syria.
lead_paragraph: Aiming to destroy chemical weapons, the process might open the way to a broader settlement.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
